name: IT Support Specialist
description: Provides technical assistance to end users experiencing hardware, software, network, or system issues. Serves as first point of contact for IT problems, troubleshooting issues, maintaining systems, and ensuring employees can work without technology barriers.

friction_points.description: Time wasted searching for solutions in fragmented knowledge bases, past tickets, and documentation
evidence_quotes: Employees waste 1.8 hours every day searching for information (McKinsey)
IT employees spend 4.2 hours looking for relevant information (Document360)
More than half take 5-29 minutes to locate a prior solution the second time (Spiceworks)

friction_points.description: Answering the same questions repeatedly (password resets, VPN setup, software access)
evidence_quotes: Password resets make up about 30% of all tickets (ITBD)
Technical service teams waste too much time answering FAQs (Help Desk Migration)
57% of employees reset a work password in the past 90 days (XL.net)

friction_points.description: Writing ticket notes, resolution summaries, and user communications from scratch each time
evidence_quotes: If it isn't in the ticket, it never happened (Dissmeyer)
Unnecessary documentation takes extra time and makes tickets confusing (Newegg)

friction_points.description: Tribal knowledge trapped in individuals' heads; poor KB maintenance; outdated documentation
evidence_quotes: Tribal knowledge: Solutions live in individuals' notebooks, bookmarked web pages (Windows Forum)
Documentation exists but is not searchable, lacks metadata (Spiceworks)

friction_points.description: Juggling multiple tickets, applications, and user conversations simultaneously
evidence_quotes: At least ten different applications open (CompTIA)
Challenging to apply training in real scenarios with multiple systems

friction_points.description: Creating ticket summaries, metrics reports, and status updates for management
evidence_quotes: Track their performance and identify areas for improvement (Common IT Help Desk)
